Name: Sipo Fanm (Ga)
description:
Manita is one of the leaders helping the rural population of Jeremie. Her location is pinned as a place where the relative poverty is severe in the aftermath of the hurricane. That's why she created a savings group with 24 females and 1 male. Her group has allowed members to socialize and show solidarity among themselves in case of funerals or sickness.

Today, Manita would like to find a loan to help members buy farming supplies to plant. Eno (left) wears a white T-shirt in the picture. He is the secretary. The second person is Yresena (treasurer), the third person is Manita (president), the fourth is Destin (animator) and the last is Yolette (deputy secretary).
